queries.name: Q2
queries.description: Find actors who have been in at least 20 movies

queries.name: Q3
queries.description: Find the actors with 20+ movies, and the movies in which they acted

queries.name: Q4
queries.description: Find prolific actors (10+) who have directed at least two films, count films acted in and list films directed

queries.name: Q5
queries.description: Rewritten to filter both :Actor and :Director labels up front (ought to be twice as fast as Q4)

queries.name: Q6
queries.description: Using the lowest cardinality label, :Director (ought to be 5 times as fast as Q5)

queries.name: Q7
queries.description: Recommendations including counts, grouping and sorting

queries.name: Q9
queries.description: Actors who played in some movie

queries.name: Q12
queries.description: Movie suggestions based on a movie

queries.name: Q13
queries.description: Co-Actors, sorted by count and some actor name
